name: Harry
description: Harry is one ofV'ssubordinates at the counterintelligence department ofArasaka, where they work alongside each other in one office space. An interaction can take place between Harry and V where Harry briefs the player on the progress of an informant inBiotechnica, and V can choose to pull the informant from the operation or to allow them to continue digging for information. Harry’s fate following this interaction is unknown, though it is likely that he had been killed inSusan Abernathy’spurge of the counterintelligence department.
